effect.black_white: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.black_2_white_2: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.black_white: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The target is blown away and switched. In the wild, a battle against a single Pokémon ends.
